questions: Do you offer an assessments in order to determine application/system interdependencies, network requirements etc. If so is this done in house or via 3rd party
Monitoring/alerting ( up/down, vCPU utilization, memory utilization, file system utilization, processes , apps etc)
Do you offer cloud readiness assessment for VMware based multi-tenant/private cloud
Describe power maintenance processes/schedules (generator, UPS, power switching, PDU etc.)
Describe  the test, validation and inspection processes of the data center fire detection and suppression systems
Describe processes/procedures for accessing the data center
Describe your client notification processes for normal and emergency maintenance
Describe your account management structure/processes
*IT Security assessments
Do you perform security assessments
EXTERNAL PENTEST - How many live and active IP addresses do you have on your external (Internet facing) network?
INTERNAL PENTEST - How many live and active IP addresses do you have on your internal network?
WEB APP ASSESSMENT - Please list the Uniform Resource Locator (URL) for each web application you would like evaluated:
WEB APP ASSESSMENT – Please describe the purpose of the application and the application stack.
WEB APP ASSESSMENT – Based on the purpose of the application, please provide a broad idea of the various workflows or routes within the application.

WEB APP ASSESSMENT - Please provide the dynamic page count for each application. A dynamic page is considered any page that takes input and/or passes unique parameters (e.g. – forms, blog posts, etc.)

WEB APP ASSESSMENT - How many APIs does the application utilize that are not tied to a third party? If possible, please provide context on the complexity of the APIs and provide associated documentation.
WEB APP ASSESSMENT - From which perspective would you like the application(s) evaluated?
WEB APP ASSESSMENT - Are these applications in a production or development environment? Development or comparable is normally recommended.
WIRELESS - How many locations will require a wireless assessment?
WIRELESS - Are the locations shared with other businesses?
Does your managed services cover all areas discussed below (WAF, API, Bot, DDoS, Certificate). If not, please elaborate.
c.              provide initial assessment of all Security Events and Alerts;

m.            assisting Customer in conducting operational security reviews to assess Provider's processes and performance to determine effectiveness in meeting Customer's security requirements for  in-scope SOC services.
DNSSEC
Botnet filtering and remediation – Botnet filtering based on geography, explicit IO addresses/Ranges and leveraging threat intelligence integrations.
